headline: Valero Energy Corporation Increases Regular Cash Dividend on Common Stock
summary: SAN ANTONIO, January 22, 2026--The Board of Directors of Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE: VLO, "Valero") has approved an increase in the company’s regular quarterly cash dividend on common stock, raising it from $1.13 per share to $1.20 per share. The dividend is payable on March 9, 2026, to shareholders of record at the close of business on February 5, 2026. The increase in the dividend raises the annualized cash dividend rate on Valero’s common stock to $4.80 per share.

The increase in the dividend raises the annualized cash dividend rate on Valero’s common stock to $4.80 per share.
